name: Car Parking 3D - Car Out
description:
It’s time to go home, but why are everybody else’s cars in the way?

Let's move them to clear the road… Hold on! These tight parking lots have tons of obstacles, so you need to move cars in the right order. You can flip the cars on the road or into each other if you move them in the wrong order. Try your best to not hit granny, and don’t even think about it!

Let's solve this difficult parking jam and get all the cars on the road! It’s a brain-burning puzzle board game, you have a chance to challenge your logical skills, critical thinking, and timing control.

How can you get cars out? As the level enhances, the complexity will also increase. Unprecedented challenges are waiting for you! Are you ready?
- Slide the car in the direction by choosing which vehicles to move to get all the cars on the road
- Cars can be moved vertically or horizontally, but you still need to blow your mind to find a way to get all cars out of the parking when the exit is not fixed.

WHY PLAY CAR PARKING 3D?
- RELIEVE your stress. Slide cars Up/ Down/ Left/ Right - Or just hit the cars to get them out of the parking jam without filing a claim or paying for compensations!
- LEARN how to move the cars quickly and smoothly without hesitant or hitting anything, just pick the right car to move
- LEVELS will get harder whenever you finish a challenge and require skills and critical thinking to be beaten.
- CUSTOMIZE Unblock cars' skins as a reward whenever you pass a level.

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY NOW - Join this fun and addictive puzzle board game and clear up the parking jam today!
